channel.title: Man shoots himself live on TV [NSFW hurry before removed] (not that graphic)
channel.description:
Here was the video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7CdqHfSHRp0
Here was the apology by FOX lolol http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FvfjXu1DDqA&feature=player_embedded

item.title: Man shoots himself live on TV [NSFW hurry before removed] (not that graphic)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:25, topic:462435”]He most likely had to apologize, I dont think anything from fox is sincere.[/quote]Judging from his reaction to seeing it live and just his body language and such during the apology it seemed sincere enough. I don’t think an anchorman represents the viewpoint and character of Fox news owners

Read full topic
